name: HOLOPONG 3D
description:
A small 3D Hololive Pong Game

Created by

  • Game Development: EiZA-BadAppleStudio

How to Play (Multiplayer)

  • Player 1 => Left Arrow & Right Arrow
  • Player 2 => N Button & M Button
  • Player 3 => W Button & S Button
  • Player 4 => I Button & K Button

How to Play (DLC)

  • Player 1 => Left Arrow & Right Arrow

Credits

  • Hololive Model (ホロライブ運営)
  • Gawr Gura Model - SiD(NPCAI)
